results.title: Fulminant hepatitis after lisinopril administration.
results.text_hl: This case strongly suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ may induce acute @<m>DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@hepatitis@@@ and that continuation of the treatment after the onset of @DISEASE_Jaundice @DISEASE_MESH:D007565 @@@jaundice@@@ can lead to life-threatening @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@hepatic failure@@@.

citations.NLM: Larrey D, Babany G, Bernuau J, Andrieux J, Degott C, Pessayre D, Benhamou JP. Fulminant hepatitis after lisinopril administration. Gastroenterology. 1990 Dec;99(6):1832-3. PMID: 2172073
